name: All Betts Are Off
description: Think you don't like mezcal? Try this cocktail and you might change your mind.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the mezcal, Dolin Blanc, Yellow Chartreuse, and grapefruit bitters to a mixing glass. Fill 2/3 full with ice and stir until well chilled, about 20 seconds. Strain into a cocktail glass, garnish with the grapefruit twist and serve.
